title: Appeal Document
description: Schema defining the metadata for an appeal

caseStatus.description: The processing status for the appeal

caseType.description: The internal code for an appeal type, e.g. D (Householder)

caseProcedure.description: The type of procedure for the appeal

caseOfficerId.description: Unique identifier for the case officer assigned to the case
caseOfficerId.$comment: This is the user ID in Active Directory

inspectorId.description: Unique identifier for the inspector assigned to the case
inspectorId.$comment: This is the user ID in Active Directory

level.description: A level used for allocation purposes

band.description: A band used for allocation purposes

specialism.description: A list of specialisms for allocation purposes

caseSubmissionDate.description: The date the appeal was submitted by the appellant

caseCreatedDate.description: The date the appeal was received

caseUpdatedDate.description: The date the appeal was last updated in the back-office

caseValidDate.description: The date since when the appeal was deemed valid

caseValidationDate.description: The date the appeal was validated in the back-office

caseValidationOutcome.description: The outcome of the validation action

examples: Appeal has not been submitted on time
The appellant doesn't have the right to appeal

caseValidationInvalidDetails.description: A list of reasons why the appeal is invalid
caseValidationInvalidDetails.$comment: The list will contain items only if the caseValidationOutcome is invalid

examples: Appellant name is not the same on the application form and appeal form

caseValidationIncompleteDetails.description: A list of reasons why the appeal is incomplete
caseValidationIncompleteDetails.$comment: The list will contain items only if the caseValidationOutcome is incomplete

caseExtensionDate.description: When the validation outcome is incomplete, an extension may be granted to provide missing information

caseStartedDate.description: A date indicating when the case was started, resulting in the creation of a timetable

lpaQuestionnaireDueDate.description: If the case is started and has a timetable, a deadline for the LPA to provide a response

lpaQuestionnairePublishedDate.description: The date indicating when the questionnaire review was completed

lpaQuestionnaireValidationOutcome.description: The outcome of the validation action

examples: Other documents or information are missing

lpaQuestionnaireIncompleteDetails.description: A list of reasons why the questionnaire is incomplete
lpaQuestionnaireIncompleteDetails.$comment: The list will contain items only if the lpaQuestionnaireValidationOutcome is incomplete

caseWithdrawnDate.description: The date the appeal was withdrawn by the appellant

caseTransferredDate.description: The date the appeal was closed to be switched to a different type

caseClosedDate.description: The date the appeal was closed and the appellant requested to resubmit

caseDecisionOutcomeDate.description: The date of the appeal decision

caseDecisionOutcome.description: The final outcome for the decision

caseCompletedDate.description: The date the appeal decision letter is published

lpaCode.description: A unique identifier for the Local Planning Authority
lpaCode.$comment: Uses the ONS code identifying LPAs

enforcementNotice.description: Indicates if an enforcement notice is the reason for the appeal

applicationReference.description: The unique identifier of the LPA application

applicationDecision.description: The outcome of the original LPA decision

applicationDecisionDate.description: The date of the original LPA decision

caseSubmissionDueDate.description: The statutory deadline for submitting an appeal from the original LPA decision date

siteAddressLine1.description: First line of address for the appeal site

siteAddressLine2.description: Second line of address for the appeal site

siteAddressTown.description: Town / City of the site address

siteAddressPostcode.description: Postal code of the site address

examples: The site is accessible through the small gate on the left of the property
There is an aggressive dog in the property
siteSafetyDetails.description: Provided information on site health and safety

siteArea.description: The site area, in square meters

greenBelt.description: Indicates if the site is in a green belt

ownsAllLand.description: Indicates if the appellant has complete ownership of the site

ownsSomeLand.description: Indicates if the appellant has partial ownership of the site

knowsOtherOwners.description: Indicates if the appellant knows other owners of the site

knowsAllOwners.description: Indicates if the appellant knows all owners of the site

advertisedAppeal.description: Indicates if the appellant has advertised the appeal to the LPA decision

ownersInformed.description: Indicates if the appellant has informed other owners of the site

identifiedOwners.description: Indicates if the appellant has attempted to identify other owners of the site

examples: Replacement of an existing gate to access the property
originalDevelopmentDescription.description: The original description of the development, as provided by the appellant

examples: Demolition of existing gate. Erection of a new taller gate
changedDevelopmentDescription.description: The description of the development, if it was changed by the LPA

linkedCaseReferences.description: A list of related case references known to the appellant

costsApplication.description: Indicates if the appellant has applied for costs
